title: Infosys | LinkedIn
text_content:
Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise, and ideas from our innovation ecosystem.

Visit www.infosys.com to see how Infosys (NYSE: INFY) can help your enterprise navigate your next.

We're honored to share that Infosys has been recognized as a Horizon 3 Market Leader in the HFS Research Horizons report: AADA Quadfecta Services for the Generative Enterprise. This recognition highlights our ability to utilize the power of analytics, #AI, data platforms, and automation (AADA) to redefine business transformation and drive innovation for our clients. Read more: infy.com/40hKwf0 #InfosysTopaz

Transforming aerospace engineering for 25+ years! Infosys provides end-to-end support from concept to #MRO for iconic aircraft like B787 & A350. With a deep role in Rolls-Royce engine programs, #GenAI innovations, and automation, we drive greener engines, faster industrialization, and cost-effective designs. Partnering for a sustainable tomorrow. infy.com/40enuWd
#AerospaceEngineering | #Innovation

Join us at the Infosys Privacy Symposium 2025 on January 28th at our Infosys Bangalore campus!

This full-day, in-person event will bring together experts from Industry, Government, Academia, and Civil Society to discuss contemporary data privacy issues, with a special focus on Indias DPDPA. 

Hosted in collaboration with ACC, DSCI, and IAPP, this symposium also commemorates International Data Privacy Day.

Dont miss this opportunity to engage in meaningful dialogue and gain valuable insights! infy.com/42fBuSo
#PrivacySymposium2025 #DataPrivacy #DPDPA #InfosysEvents

Securing the future of cutting-edge research.

Scientific progress is the backbone of a brighter future, but it requires support, resources, and belief in its potential.

At #InfosysFoundation, we are committed to strengthening research in India through our partnership with the Harish-Chandra Research Institute (HRI), a renowned institute for mathematics and theoretical physics in Allahabad since 1975. Recognizing the institutes remarkable potential, the Foundation established the Infosys Endowment Fund for Mathematics and Theoretical Physics. Complementing this, we introduced the Infosys Chair Professorship to celebrate excellence and empower distinguished scientists to innovate, mentor, and inspire.

This professorship is awarded to an internationally renowned scientist, reflecting exceptional academic and research achievements. The support includes remuneration, research funding, teaching innovations, and more, ensuring an environment where innovation and excellence can thrive. The inaugural recipient, Padma Bhushan awardee Prof. Ashoke Sen, is one of the worlds leading string theorists.

Our support extends further through programs like Infosys Distinguished Visiting Professors for senior faculty and Infosys Visiting Professors for junior faculty. By inviting global experts from countries such as Italy, England, and the USA to collaborate at HRI, we aim to drive cutting-edge research and nurture world-class talent.

Together with HRI, we are cultivating an ecosystem to elevate Indias global reputation in mathematics and theoretical physics, securing the future of Indian scientific research.

#InfosysCSR | #Education | #Innovation | #Research

For 7 years, Tennis Australia and Infosys have been elevating experiences for fans and players with Digital, Cloud, and #AI, with innovations to inform, engage, and entertain. This year, we bring #GenAI on the court and beyond with three new properties: AI Commentary in the Infosys Match Centre; AI Stadium, to level up the #VR Tennis experience, and Beyond Tennis, a new Gen AI Tennis league.

Hear from Craig Tiley and Ridley Plummer as they provide a glimpse into our new innovations at AO 2025!  

#AusOpenWithInfosys #ExperienceTheNext

How can companies effectively address the diverse and evolving expectations of their employees and truly enhance the employee experience?

Stay tuned as in our next episode, we will delve into the principles of employee-centric design. Ralf Gehrig, Global CXO at WongDoody will share insights on how to place employees at the center of your approach, providing personalized services, fostering meaningful connections, and automating mundane tasks to enable employees to focus on impactful work.

#ExperienceDesign #EmployeeExperience #DigitalWorkplceServices #GenAI #EmployeeCentric #NextAtWork
Chidambaram Ganapathi | Mohan Krishnaraj | Geetanjali Joshi | Amit Charles | Nisha  Jose | Rashmi Joshi | Purnima Rajta Dhillon | Sujeet Kumar

Sudipta Ghosh on leveraging Microsoft 365 Copilot to accelerate deal closures.

How does #Microsoft365Copilot accelerate deal closures and help clients quickly realize business value from digital workplace transformations?

Sudipta explains that Microsoft 365 Copilot accelerates deal closures and enables clients to realize business value faster from their #digitalworkplace transformations. For instance, a European client leveraged AI to transition from a legacy device-based environment to a modern client environment. #AI ensured personal drive, hardware compatibility, and application readiness, facilitating a seamless transition with millions of data entries and showcasing the efficiency and effectiveness of AI in digital transformations.

Here's how we leverage Microsoft 365 Copilot - infy.com/4hgt01v
#ModernWorkplace #NextAtWork
Shishank Gupta I Rohit Verma I Sumit Sahota I Rashmi Joshi I Purnima Rajta Dhillon I Sujeet Kumar

Infosys and Indian Institute for Human Settlements proudly hosted the BioConserve Summit 2025 to address the urgent issue of global biodiversity loss due to rapid urbanization.

Inspired by Infosys campuses across India, renowned for their sustainability and biodiversity efforts, the summit brought together conservation experts to collaborate on and implement actionable strategies for incorporating ecological principles in urban restoration.

Together, we're moving the urban sustainability dialogue forward and making strides toward a greener, more biodiverse future.

#BioConserveSummit2025 #ESGIsAnOpportunity

The IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Adobe Experience Cloud Professional Services report 2024-25 has placed Infosys in the Leaders Category! We believe this reflects our commitment to delivering Adobe solutions and driving impactful digital transformations. Read the excerpt here: infy.com/42a7U0z
#DigitalTransformation #AdobeExperienceCloud #IDCMarketScape
